column4: i have a machine with warty installed, updates to hoary development in november, how do i get the notification icon for software updates? i already installed the neccessary packages, but there's no periodical checking of updates AFAIS
do an apt-get -s install ubuntu-desktop and check what you are still missing
anacron is to only package i can think of which could be related to that thing
it works, anacron has been the missing package
Can't use USB drives (because /dev/sdb is specified as a cd drive)
usb drives are not to be put in /etc/fstab
and that entry was created when?
mention all that in the bug please and file it against the installer (ubiquity is the graphical installer, debian-installer is the command-line one)
